<title level="1" right="Rules">[Kingdom Feats 2nd](/Rules.aspx?ID=1764)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 513</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
At 2nd level, and then every 2 levels thereafter, the kingdom gains a [Kingdom feat](/feats?include-traits=Kingdom&sort=level-asc%3Bname-asc).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Kingdom Feats 2nd
